content: sweet oddity art mini dragon crochet pattern https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart copyright 2019 of sweet oddity art all rights reserved you are not allowed to sell this pattern you are not allowed to distribute or publish this pattern in any form you are not allowed to alter this pattern in any form sweet oddity art 1 pattern details size 11 inches from bottom of foot to top of head with weight 4 yarn and a 3 25 mm hook skill level needed intermediate- suitable for novice crocheters requires patience and precisions when assembling the dragon and basic crochet skills contact info if you have any questions or concerns about this pattern please do not hesitate to contact me i will get back to you within 24 hours sweetoddityart@gmail com https //www etsy com/shop/sweetoddityart materials needed yarn worsted weight #4 color a green color b cream color c pink hook size d hook or 3 25 mm 12 mm safety eyes scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch inc3= 3 single_crochet in the same stitch single_crochet= single_crochet stitch f/o= fasten_off sl= slip_stitch flo= front loops only double_crochet= double_crochet stitch bob st= bobble stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head crocheted from front of nose to back of head starting with color b 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 4 2 single_crochet increase x 6= 24 5 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 30 6 flo 4 single_crochet bob st 8 single_crochet bob st 16 single_crochet= 30 7-9 single_crochet in each st around change to color a 10 single_crochet in each st around 11 4 single_crochet increase x 6= 36 12 5 single_crochet increase x 6= 42 13 6 single_crochet increase x 6= 48 place eyes between row 12 and 13 leaving 10 holes between them 14-19 single_crochet in each st around 20 7 single_crochet decrease x 6= 42 6 single_crochet decrease 21 single_crochet in each st around 22 5 single_crochet decrease x 6= 36 start stuffing the head 23 4 single_crochet decrease x 6= 30 24 3 single_crochet decrease x 6= 24 25 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 18 26 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 27 decrease x 6= 6 f/o and sew the hole closed sweet oddity art 3 body arms make 2 with color a with color a 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 increase in each st around= 12
